msg: Add the modules/debug directory to the NetWare build

author: sylvain
msg: Fix bug #31668 : Use EntityResolver when parsing CForms files

author: leif
msg: Some versions of Java are unable to correctly follow redirects if the redirect URL is relative.  Fix this by making sure that the HTTP connector always returns absolute URLs for redirects.   Note that this is only possible for clients which supply a Host: header.  Otherwise there is no way to resolve a host and port from behind a firewall.
